00034 Sortie& Solveur_Lineaire_Std::printOn(Sortie& os ) const
00035 {
00036   Cerr << " The implicit solver used is of type Solveur_Lineaire_Std " << finl;
00037   return Solveur_lineaire::printOn(os);

00039 
00040 Entree& Solveur_Lineaire_Std::readOn(Entree& is )
00041 {
00042   Cerr << " The implicit solver used is of type Solveur_Lineaire_Std " << finl;
00043   Motcles les_mots(1);
00044   {
00045     les_mots[0] = "solveur";
00046   }
00047   Motcle motlu, accolade_fermee="}", accolade_ouverte="{";
00048   is >> motlu;
00049   if(motlu!=accolade_ouverte)
00050     {
00051       Cerr << "One expected a { when reading " << que_suis_je() << finl;
00052       Cerr << "instead of : " << motlu << finl;
00053       exit();
00054     }
00055   is >> motlu;
00056   while(motlu != accolade_fermee )
00057     {
00058       int rang=les_mots.search(motlu);
00059       switch(rang)
00060         {
00061 // case 0 : {
00062 // is >> seuil_convg_implicite_;
00063 // break;
00064 // }
00065 // case 1 : {
00066 // is >> seuil_resol_implicite_;
00067 // break;
00068 // }
00069         case 0 :
00070           {
00071             Nom nom_solveur("Solv_");
00072 
00073             Nom type_solv_sys;
00074 
00075             is >> type_solv_sys;
00076             nom_solveur+=type_solv_sys;
00077             Cerr << "nom_solveur " << nom_solveur << finl;
00078             solveur.typer(nom_solveur);
00079             is >> solveur.valeur();
00080             solveur.nommer("solveur_implicite");
00081             break;
00082           }
00083         default :
00084           {
00085             Cerr<<"An object of type "<<que_suis_je()<<" cannot read the word "<<motlu<<finl;
00086             Cerr<<"One expected a word among :"<<finl<<les_mots<<finl;
00087             abort();
00088           }
00089         }
00090       is >> motlu;
00091     }
00092   if (!solveur.non_nul())
00093     {
00094       Cerr << "Error among the data given for the implicite time scheme " << finl;
00095       Cerr << "The solver has not been specified.  " << finl;
00096       exit();
00097     }
00098 
00099   return is;
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool Solveur_Lineaire_Std::iterer_eqn(Equation_base& equation, const DoubleTab& inconnue, DoubleTab& result, double dt, int numero_iteration, int& ok)
00103 {
00104   assert( numero_iteration == 1 );
00105   Matrice_Morse matrix;
00106   DoubleTrav    rhs(result);
00107   equation.dimensionner_matrice(matrix);
00108   equation.assembler_avec_inertie(matrix, inconnue, rhs);
00109   solveur.valeur().reinit();
00110   solveur.resoudre_systeme(matrix, rhs, result);
00111   return true;
00112 }
